events.name: ev battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for electric vehicle batteries involves various stages from raw material extraction to battery recycling and reuse.
events.description: The supply chain for electric vehicle batteries involves various stages from raw material extraction to battery recycling and reuse.

events.name: economic viability
events.wd_description: Discussion on the economic impacts of upgrading the electrical grid to support electric mobility.
events.description: Discussion on the economic impacts of upgrading the electrical grid to support electric mobility.

events.name: cost analysis
events.wd_description: Many studies analyze the economic feasibility of EVs by examining the cost of fuel and battery components.
events.description: Many studies analyze the economic feasibility of EVs by examining the cost of fuel and battery components.

events.name: hydrogen vehicles
events.wd_description: Analysis of the cost of owning and driving a fuel-cell electric vehicle powered by green hydrogen.
events.description: Analysis of the cost of owning and driving a fuel-cell electric vehicle powered by green hydrogen.

events.name: lithium-ion battery
events.wd_description: Examination of lithium-ion batteries, focusing on chemical components and life cycle analysis.
events.description: Examination of lithium-ion batteries, focusing on chemical components and life cycle analysis.

events.name: rare-earth elements
events.wd_description: Analysis of the exploration and production of rare-earth elements, highlighting the need for further production and overcoming technical and economic challenges.
events.description: Analysis of the exploration and production of rare-earth elements, highlighting the need for further production and overcoming technical and economic challenges.

events.name: supply chain risk
events.wd_description: Examination of supply chain risks, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic and its impact on production and sales.
events.description: Examination of supply chain risks, especially during the COVID-19 pandemic and its impact on production and sales.

events.name: supply chain resilience
events.wd_description: Analysis of supply chain resilience strategies, including reverse resilience and reducing material scarcity.
events.description: Analysis of supply chain resilience strategies, including reverse resilience and reducing material scarcity.

events.name: synthetic gas supply chains
events.wd_description: Investigation of the greenhouse gas emissions of fuel cell electric vehicles fueled with hydrogen and synthetic natural gas.
events.description: Investigation of the greenhouse gas emissions of fuel cell electric vehicles fueled with hydrogen and synthetic natural gas.

events.name: logistics sector
events.wd_description: Analysis of the use of electric vehicles in the logistics sector, including challenges and benefits.
events.description: Analysis of the use of electric vehicles in the logistics sector, including challenges and benefits.
